{{cohete.name}}
ID:{{cohete.id}}
  • Cost per launch: {{cohete.cost_per_launch}}
  • Height (meters): {{cohete.height.meters}}
  • Diameter (meters): {{cohete.diameter.meters}}
  • Mass (Kg): {{cohete.mass.kg}}

{{cohete.description}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CohetesService } from 'src/app/services/cohetes.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cohetes', templateUrl: './cohetes.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cohetes.component.css'] }) export class CohetesComponent implements OnInit { cohetesRender!:any isLoaded!:boolean constructor(private cohetesS:CohetesService) { } async ngOnInit():Promise { this.obtenerCohetes() this.isLoaded=true } obtenerCohetes(){ this.cohetesS.obtenerCohetes().subscribe( (res:any)=>{ console.log(res); this.cohetesRender=[...res] },err=>{ console.log(err); }) } }
